Plot factors
```{r}
p <- plot_factor(
  model,
  factor = 7,
  group_by = "group",
  color_by = sample_metadata_filt$lineage10x_2, 
  add_violin = T, color_violin = T,
  scale = T, dodge=T, dot_size=1, legend = F, rasterize = F
)
p <- p + scale_color_manual(values=opts$colors) + scale_fill_manual(values=opts$colors)
p <- p + theme(
  strip.text = element_text(size=rel(1.3), color="black")
)

# pdf(paste0(io$pdfdir,"/Factor3_values.pdf"), width=opts$factors.width, height=opts$factors.height, useDingbats = F)
print(p)
# dev.off()
```

Plot factor coloured by gene expression
```{r}
# genes <- c("Ttr","Apom","Apoa1","Amn")
genes <- c("Hspa8","Atp5b","Rpl41","Ldha")

for (i in genes) {
  p <- plot_factors(model,
    factors = 3,
    group_by = "group",
    color_by = i,
    rasterize = F, legend = F
  )
  p <- p + theme(
    axis.text.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(size=rel(1.3), color="black"),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
  )
  
  # print(p)
  
  pdf(sprintf("%s/Factor3_%s.pdf",io$pdfdir,i), width=5, height=3, useDingbats = F)
  print(p)
  dev.off()
}
```
